sentence: In early trading on Monday, shares of Salesforce.com ( CRM ) topped the list of the day's best performing components of the S&P 500 index, trading up 1.9%.
Year to date, Salesforce.com has lost about 3.2% of its value.
And the worst performing S&P 500 component thus far on the day is Tyson Foods ( TSN ), trading down 7.2%.
Tyson Foods is showing a gain of 18.4% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are JPMorgan Chase & Co. ( JPM ), trading down 2.8%, and ADT Corp ( ADT ), trading up 1.6% on the day.
The views and opinions expressed herein are the views and opinions of the author and do not necessarily reflect those of Nasdaq, Inc.
